Package net.objectzoo.ebc.executor

Class ProcessAndResultFlowToFunctionAdapter<ProcessParameter,​ResultParameter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.ebc.executor.ProcessAndResultFlowToFunctionAdapter<ProcessParameter,​ResultParameter>
  • Type Parameters:
    ProcessParameter - the process parameter type of the flow
    ResultParameter - the result parameter type of the flow
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<ProcessParameter,​ResultParameter>
    public class ProcessAndResultFlowToFunctionAdapter<ProcessParameter,​ResultParameter>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Function<ProcessParameter,​ResultParameter>
    This adapter adapts an ProcessAndResultFlow to a Function. It does this by subscribing to the final result event for each single Function invocation and returning the last result send after the flow execution before finally unsubscribing from the event again and returning to the caller. Doing so this implementation is inherently not thread save regarding multiple simultaneous execution of the flow and flows that contain asynchronous execution chains.
    Author:
    tilmann
